divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a summer night not sure of the month it was dusk for some reason that night seemed like a lot of people were standing outside in there driveways which we were doing also I was at a friends house at the time anyway we all here this sound which is going to b e hard to explain it was like a pulling in sound like an energy static sound then made a sound like a rocket fireing its engine but it only lasted like 2 seconds then it flew right over us it was pure white looked like glowing electricity it was a triangle shape but squared its hard. To explain the shape but anyway it kept flying straight and gaining speed from the time it went over us and you can clearly see it was in space already was maybe 20 seconds or less and even after it left earth you can still see it looked like a star but it didn't go down the horizon like rockets do when they launch from cocoa beach they go out to the east and go down as the earth turns anyway this didn't it stayd in the same spot but getting farther away then about 15 mins after we have been watching it two helicopters were flying around in the distance but we were all like there way to late now unless they can fly out into space but that's about it for that one I have a lot more I have seen back in the late 90s one was flying maybe 75 to a 100 feet away from me along side of me on the highway then one night we stoped on the side of the raod and watched 3 huge building like crafts come down they were around 1 to 2 miles long and a half mile thick well if you have any questions you can email me or call me on the cell # I gave you.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sebring
There was one other sighting in Sebring on or around June 1st 2009
Summary: a number of people saw it it came out of a lake and came right over us and went straight into space
